originalText.text: I had the Ellacor procedure done by Natasha and she did a fantastic job. From the time I sat down in the chair until the very end of the procedure she kept me informed of what was happening.  I could not be happier with the way it has turned out and I highly recommend Natasha....she was great.

text.text: I had the Ellacor procedure done by Natasha and she did a fantastic job. From the time I sat down in the chair until the very end of the procedure she kept me informed of what was happening.  I could not be happier with the way it has turned out and I highly recommend Natasha....she was great.

originalText.text:
I got introduced to Dr. Frank about 3 years ago and have been seeing him for about 2 years. And I will tell you that you get exactly what you pay for: Dr. Frank has an artistic eye and skillset that goes unmatched, and is also extremely knowledgeable on the latest and greatest innovations on all things skin and body. He’ll also be realistic and tell you what can and cannot happen.

For me personally, Dr. Frank has elevated my skin and transformed my look— it’s still me, but enhanced in such a way that it goes unnoticed unless it is said. And most importantly, it lasts. If you’re looking for someone extremely knowledgeable who is warm with an equally as skilled staff as well, go and don’t look back— it will be your best decision yet

originalText.text: Dr. Frank and his team are truly the best of the best. The team went above and beyond to make me feel comfortable and guide me through the process. Shoutout to my nurse, Ashley! I would wholeheartedly recommend PFrankMD.

text.text: Dr. Frank and his team are truly the best of the best. The team went above and beyond to make me feel comfortable and guide me through the process. Shoutout to my nurse, Ashley! I would wholeheartedly recommend PFrankMD.

originalText.text:
Dr. Frank is the WIZARD OF TALENT !!!!!
I first wanted to do injectables & Fraxel a few years back, but was too afraid to trust anyone with my face. Decided to hold off until I know I’m going to the #1 best out there. Which is exactly what happened when I discovered him. He’s warm, compassionate, genuine and simply lights up the room. Attentively listened to all my questions & concerns. Thoroughly explained everything. His perfectionism & passion is v apparent. Love his “pro-aging” philosophy. Was an easy decision choosing him to be the one to do my first botox, fillers and fraxel. The results have EXCEEDED my expectations !! it looks so natural, I can’t even tell where he placed the injections. Needless to say, I trust him with any procedure I want to undergo in the future, face & body. His professional staff are incredible too - always making me laugh & comfortable.  Feel super lucky to have him as my doctor, for life. Worth all the money. Cannot wait for my next visit.

originalText.text: i had an amazing experience! everyone was extremely kind, knowledgeable, and helpful throughout my appointment. i had Dr Yang and she is amazing- i highly recommend her or any other doctor here
